title: Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon Long Sleeve Maxi Cocktail
title_original: Women's Sequin Mesh Long Sleeve Sexy Backless Bodycon Cocktail Maxi Dress

specs.Best Sellers Rank: #132,004 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry ( See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry ) #832 in Women's Club & Night Out Dresses

category: Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry > Women > Clothing > Dresses > Club & Night Out

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect wedding guest dress!!
items.body: Absolutely in love with this dress!! It was extremely soft and comfortable, the perfect amount of stretch, and the mesh sleeves plus the open back was sooo nice. I get hot very easily so this dress was the perfect in between for a winter wedding!! The length was perfect, it went right down to my ankles. The quality of this dress was great, the only thing I noticed is the sequin pieces were getting caught on things and starting to pull but other than that, this was so worth it for the price!! I got so many compliments all night and I will definitely wear this for other events !! Read more
items.author: Christina

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Elegant and sexy, but really comfortable
items.body: This dress slides like a second skin, and feels fabulous against your skin. It shimmers. The cloth has just enough stretch to forgive little flaws and hide the body details we don't want to share with everyone. The body section is lined and the sleeves are unlined with a slight flare at the bottom. This isn't a dress for every occasion, but it's elegant and sexy for the right occasion. Read more
items.author: B & K DB

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Comfy & sexy
items.body: Looks great on, hugs in all the right places, I'm older, so a bra is definitely required(they make those stick on ones). Only drawback....it is VERY sheer! I almost want to sew in a slip! , Soft inside, manageable level of "scratchiness" on the outside. Probably won't keep you warm. Lol. The bell sleeves are very elegant & just the right level of dangle, so you're not knocking over your drink reaching for the salt Read more
items.author: MBP666

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Baby steps only
items.body: Nice dress. Glitter threaded through light fabric. Cant walk in it. Bottom too tight. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stunning & Comfortable Black-Tie Dress
items.body: I got this HERYEA Women’s Sequin Mesh Long Sleeve Backless Bodycon Maxi Dress for my wife, who is 5'4", 138 lbs, with an athletic build. We ordered a size small, and it was true to size, fitting her perfectly. The dress is stunning, very sparkly but not over-the-top, making it ideal for a black-tie ball. It definitely stands out in the best way. She also mentioned that it’s surprisingly comfortable and breathable, so you won’t get overheated while wearing it. While a slit in the skirt could make walking and striding easier, the overall look and feel of the dress more than makes up for it. Pros: - True to size and flattering fit - Gorgeous sequin sparkle without being overwhelming - Comfortable and breathable material - Perfect for formal events like balls or galas Cons: - There is no slit in the skirt (minor, but worth noting), which restricts movement. Durability: Well-constructed with quality sequins that don’t shed easily—should hold up for multiple events. Value for Money: Fantastic. Looks and feels like a designer dress at a fraction of the price. Read more
items.author: Krusader171

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars The perfect black dress!
items.body: What a gorgeous dress! This long evening dress is absolutely stunning! The material is so well made, yet it’s lightweight enough to “breathe”. And move freely in. I am 5’6 and 145 pounds and I ordered a size medium as I wanted a snug fit. The material has a bit of a stretch to it. The shimmer details make this dress look high end. I could see this dress being worn for a date night, or a work or Christmas party event. I instantly noticed the low back on the dress and my mind started wandering with ideas! This dress can be “flipped” to be worn with a slip of color underneath it. (Gold or red would look amazing!) Add a belt, and you’ve just taken the look to the next level. The versatility in this dress is endless. Five stars! I highly recommend! Read more
items.author: Hummingbird23

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars You will look gorgeous in this one!
items.body: The media could not be loaded. Oh Boy! What a wonderful way to make an entrance! This dress is a bodycon (fitted to the body) and has a very low back and high neck in the front. In addition, the sleeves are see-through and are flared at the cuffs. The body of the dress falls over the hips and then continues from the hips straight to the floor. The bottom of the dress has the same pretty stitching as the cuffs do. Also, the underslip ends 1" before, which will show your ankles. The dress is lined with a warm, soft material that is comfortable to the skin, and even though backless, I think you will survive those Fall nights. I noticed that both the sleeves at the cuff-end started to fray. This is an easy fix with fabric glue, and the dress, and the way you will look in it,, is certainly well worth the trouble. Read more
items.author: youarefree

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sparkly, Sexy & Perfect for a Night Out ✨
items.body: This dress is a showstopper! The sequins shimmer beautifully under the light, and the mesh long sleeves add such a chic touch. I love the backless design — it’s sexy without being too over the top. The bodycon fit hugs your curves but still has enough stretch to be comfortable for a whole evening. I wore it to a cocktail event and felt amazing in it — got so many compliments! If you’re looking for something glamorous for a party, wedding reception, or special night out, this is definitely the dress. Read more
items.author: The Jazzy Edition

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon Long Sleeve Maxi Cocktail is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon Long Sleeve Maxi Cocktail is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Black Sequin Backless Maxi Dress. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
